ideas: Implement a Read Later feature for saving comics found through search results. Suggest a dark mode option for better reading at night.
Improve mobile gestures for **page-turning** and zooming. Add a feature to **sync reading progress** across different devices instantly.
Create a **moderation dashboard** for reviewing user-submitted content. Develop a reporting tool for monthly **active user engagement** metrics.
Introduce a **beginner's guide/tutorial** upon first login. Add **curated lists** like 'Top 10 Starter Comics' to aid new users in finding content.
